ACCOUNT.FAILED_CHECK_USERNAME: Failed to check username, please try again later.

WARNING_DIALOG.TITLE: DEMONSTRATION DATA ONLY
WARNING_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: NOTICE: The purpose of this system is to demonstrate the features of Consent2Share, using TEST DATA ONLY. Any use of REAL PATIENT DATA and/or patient identifying information will be a violation of state and federal privacy laws, specifically 42 CFR Part 2, HIPAA, and Title 38 and the user(s) may be subject to fines and/or imprisonment as defined under the enforcement rules of Office of Civil Rights.

WELCOME.TITLE: Let's get started.
WELCOME.DESCRIPTION: Before youâ€™re able to share your health data and information, we need to gather a few more details.

STEP_1.TITLE: Step 1.
STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: Begin by adding the people with whom you trust to share your health information.

STEP_2.TITLE: Step 2.
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: Begin by adding the people with whom you trust to share your health information.

ADD_PROVIDER.TITLE: Add Providers Alert
ADD_PROVIDER.DESCRIPTION: To create consents, you must first add at least 2 Providers with whom you trust to share your health information.

LIST.TITLE: My Providers
LIST.WARNING: OK! You must add at least two contacts before sharing your health information.

DELETE_DIALOG.TITLE: Delete provider
DELETE_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this provider?

STEP_1.LABEL: PLEASE CHOOSE ONE.

STATE_AND_CITY.LABEL: Enter State and City

STEP_2.TITLE: Step 2. Please enter the provider Facility Name OR Provider Name and Other Criteria.

PROVIDER_NAME_AND_OTHERS.LABEL: Enter Provider Name and Other Criteria
PROVIDER_NAME_AND_OTHERS.LAST_NAME_MIN_LENGHT_MSG: Must be at least 2 characters long.
PROVIDER_NAME_AND_OTHERS.FIRST_NAME_MIN_LENGHT_MSG: Must be at least 2 characters long.

FACILITY.LABEL: Enter Facility Name
FACILITY.NAME_MIN_LENGTH_MSG: Must be at least 2 characters long.

CONSENTS.TITLE: My Consents
CONSENTS.WARNING: There are currently no Consents available. Please click the Add a Consent button to create a new consent.

CARD.SHARE_ALL_MEDICAL_INFORMATION: All my medical information can be shared.

TRY_POLICY_CONSENT_DIALOG.TITLE: Apply My Record
TRY_POLICY_CONSENT_DIALOG.TRY-POLICY-ERROR: Error on viewing policies applied on medical document

CONSENT_SAVE_STAGE.APPLY_TRY_POLICY: Try My Consent Settings against My Medical Record before Sharing

DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Please select one individual or organization authorized to share your information:

MEDICAL_INFORMATION.TITLE: Medical Information
MEDICAL_INFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Select how you would like to share your medical information.
MEDICAL_INFORMATION.SHARE_ALL_RADIO: SHARE my medical record WITHOUT ANY EXCEPTION of medical information categories.
MEDICAL_INFORMATION.SHARE_SOME_RADIO: SHARE my medical record WITH EXCEPTION of specific medical information categories.

DIALOG.TITLE: Privacy Settings
DIALOG.SHARE_ALL_PARAGRAPH: You have chosen to share all of your medical record without any exception.
DIALOG.NOT_SHARE_ALL_PARAGRAPH: Please select the medical information that you want to share.
DIALOG.FED_DESCRIPTION: Federal requirements strictly restrict health professionals from disclosing substance abuse treatment information without signed patient consent ' + '(called 42 CFR Part 2 ).' +'You have the right to choose the information you wish to share or not share and with whom.
DIALOG.STATE_DESCRIPTION: Most states have laws restricting health professionals from disclosing information related to substance abuse, HIV/AIDS, and mental health. ' +'Some states have restrictions regarding genetic information and communicable diseases. You have the right to choose the information you wish to share or not share and with whom.
DIALOG.WARNING_ONE: Please select the "Share my medical record without any exceptions" option,if you want to share all of your health information.
DIALOG.WARNING_TWO: Please select AT LEAST ONE category that you want to share.

PURPOSE_OF_USE.TITLE: Purpose Of Use
PURPOSE_OF_USE.DESCRIPTION: Choose for what purposes your medical information may be used.
PURPOSE_OF_USE.SHARE_TEXT: SHARE my medical record ONLY for the selected purposes of use.

DIALOG.TITLE: Share for selected purpose only
DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Share my information only for specified purposes of use.

CONSENT_TERMS.TITLE: Consent Terms
CONSENT_TERMS.TEXT: Enter a start and end date during wich your medical records will be shared.
CONSENT_TERMS.ERROR_PAST_START_DATE: Start date should be in the present.
CONSENT_TERMS.ERROR_PAST_END_DATE: End date should be in the present.
CONSENT_TERMS.ERROR_END_DATE_BEFORE_START: Start date should proceed end date.

CONSENT_SIGN.TITLE: Consent to Share My Medical Information

HEALTH_INFORMATION_SECTION.TITLE: HEALTH INFORMATION TO BE DISCLOSED
HEALTH_INFORMATION_SECTION.SHARE_MEDICAL_INFO: To SHARE the following medical information
HEALTH_INFORMATION_SECTION.SHARE_PURPOSES: To SHARE for the following purpose(s)

CONSENT_TERMS_SECTION.TITLE: CONSENT TERMS
CONSENT_TERMS_SECTION.TERMS: I, {{name}}, hereby accept, and understand the terms of this consent.

COMPLETE_DIALOG.CLICK_TO_DOWNLOAD_MSG: You may obtain a copy of your signed consent by clicking the 'Download' button.

ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION.TITLE: Account Setup Verification
ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION.NOTIFICATION: To setup your personal account, begin by entering your Date of Birth and the Verification Code that was provided to you. All fields are required in order to proceed.
ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION.VERIFICATION_CODE: Verification Code (Verification Code is case sensitive)

ACCOUNT_ACTIVATION.TITLE: Create your Account
ACCOUNT_ACTIVATION.NOTIFICATION: Please create a Password for your account.Create your username and password and store it in a secure place, you will need it to login to your account.

ACCOUNT_ACTIVATION_SUCCESS.TITLE: Account Activation Complete!
ACCOUNT_ACTIVATION_SUCCESS.NOTIFICATION2: You have successfully created your {{brandName}} password. Click on the button below to log in to your account.

ACCOUNT_ACTIVATION_ERROR.TITLE: Account Activation Failed!
ACCOUNT_ACTIVATION_ERROR.NOTIFICATION: Whoops! An error occurred during account activation. Please contact for a new Verification Code.
ACCOUNT_ACTIVATION_ERROR.NOTIFICATION_FOR_BUTTON: Please click the button below for more information about Consent2Share available on the C2S Login Page
